name: Dynamics AX Application Label Data File
summary: Learn about .ALD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Dynamics AX label files are typically stored in the following directory: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Dynamics AX\40\Application\Appl\Standard."
NOTE: Microsoft developed Dynamics AX after acquiring Axtapa Systems.

description: Contains text for forms within Microsoft Dynamics AX, a business management solution; may be used for field labels, messages, and other purposes; a separate ALD file exists for each supported language of the Dynamics AX user interface.
